gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.deleteErrorGeneral: Could not move items to trash.
gallery.deleteErrorUnexpected: An unexpected error occurred while moving items to trash.
gallery.moveToPrivateErrorGeneral: Could not move items to private folder.
gallery.moveToPrivateErrorUnexpected: An unexpected error occurred while moving items to private folder.
gallery.addToAlbumNoSelectionDescription: Please select items to add to an album.
gallery.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to move {count} item(s) to the trash?
uploadModal.title: Upload Files
uploadModal.dropzone.acceptedFormats: Images (JPG, PNG, GIF, WEBP, etc.) or Videos (MP4, WEBM, MOV, etc.)
uploadModal.partialSuccessDescription: Files processed, but no new items were reported.
uploadModal.errorUnexpected: An unexpected error occurred during upload.
mediaViewer.adultContentConfirmation.des: This content is marked +18. Do you wish to continue and view the content?
settings.title: Settings
settings.language.description: Select your preferred language for the application.
settings.language.saveErrorUnexpected: An error occurred while saving language preference.
settings.privateFolder.description: Manage the security of your private folder.
settings.privateFolder.notSetDescription: You haven't set a password for your private folder yet.
settings.privateFolder.changeModal.title: Change Private Folder Password
settings.privateFolder.changeModal.descr: Enter your current password and the new password.
settings.privateFolder.setupModal.title: Set Up Private Folder Password
settings.privateFolder.setupModal.descri: Set a new password for your private folder.
settings.privateFolder.passwordMinLength: The new password must be at least 6 characters long.
settings.privateFolder.removeModal.title: Confirm Password Removal
settings.privateFolder.removeModal.descr: Are you sure you want to remove the private folder password? This will make the folder and its content no longer password-protected.
settings.privateFolder.successChangedDes: Your private folder password has been updated.
settings.privateFolder.successRemovedDes: Your private folder password has been removed.
settings.storage.calculationError: Could not calculate storage usage at this time.
settings.storage.emptyTrash.confirmDescr: Are you sure you want to permanently delete all items from the trash? This action cannot be undone.
settings.storage.emptyTrash.emptyDescrip: There are no items in the trash to delete.
settings.activeSessions.description: Here you can see and manage where your session is active.
settings.activeSessions.terminate.errorU: An error occurred while closing the session.
settings.activeSessions.terminate.confir: Are you sure you want to log out this session on {deviceInfo}?
settings.activeSessions.terminate.curren: You will be disconnected from your account.
settings.activeSessions.terminateOther.s: All other sessions have been closed.
settings.activeSessions.terminateOther.e: An error occurred while closing other sessions.
settings.activeSessions.terminateOther.c: Are you sure you want to close all other active sessions? Your current session will remain active.
settings.dataManagement.description: Back up your metadata or restore from a previous backup. This does not include uploaded media files (images/videos).
settings.dataManagement.export.title: Export Data
settings.dataManagement.export.descripti: Download a ZIP file with all your configuration data and gallery metadata. Keep this file safe.
settings.dataManagement.import.title: Import Data
settings.dataManagement.import.descripti: Select a PixelSphere backup .zip file. Importing will replace your current data. Use with caution!
settings.dataManagement.import.completed: Data imported successfully. It's recommended to reload the application or log out and log back in.
settings.dataManagement.import.errorUnkn: An unknown error occurred during import.
settings.dataManagement.import.warningDe: You are about to replace all your current PixelSphere data with the content of this file. This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?
privateFolder.title: Private Folder
privateFolder.description: Content in this folder is password protected.
privateFolder.loginRequired: You must be logged in to access the private folder.
privateFolder.statusCheckError: Could not check private folder status.
privateFolder.loadError: Could not load private folder items.
privateFolder.emptyFolder: This folder is empty. Add items from your gallery to keep them private.
privateFolder.accessRestrictedDescriptio: Please set up or enter the password for your private folder to view its contents.
privateFolder.moveToGalleryErrorGeneral: Could not move items to gallery.
privateFolder.moveToTrashErrorGeneral: Could not move items to trash.
privateFolder.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to move {count} item(s) to the trash? They will be recoverable from the Trash page for 30 days.
